css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-4dcd096b-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-top:150px;padding-bottom:150px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-4dcd096b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{background-image:url('_path_to_replace_blog-single-post-bsp-01/images/accdbfab-bg-image-archive-3-col.webp');background-size:cover;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center center;background-origin:padding-box;background-clip:border-box;background-attachment:scroll;opacity:1;-webkit-transform:translate3d(0,0,0);width:100%;height:100%;display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-4dcd096b-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),0.6);display:block;}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-4dcd096b-u{padding-top:120px;padding-bottom:120px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-4dcd096b-u{padding-top:100px;padding-bottom:100px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-4dcd096b-u{padding-top:80px;padding-bottom:80px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-4dcd096b-u{padding-top:60px;padding-bottom:60px;}}
